price: 92. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Haaruunow! Maxaa kuu diiday markaad aragtay inay lumeen.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
